channel.title: deep learning on 111qqz的小窝
channel.description: Recent content in deep learning on 111qqz的小窝

item.title: tmp
item.description: import pandas as pd from sklearn.datasets import fetch_mldata mnist = fetch_mldata(“MNIST original”) X = mnist.data / 255.0 y = mnist.target #print X.shape, y.shape feat_cols = [ 'pixel'+str(i) for i in range(X.shape[1]) ] df = pd.DataFrame(X,columns=feat_cols) # transform into some pandas DS named DataFrame df['label'] = y # add a column named 'label',valued by variable y df['label'] = df['label'].apply(lambda i: str(i)) # df.apply (some funciton) X, y = None, None import matplotlib.

item.title: 反向传播学习笔记
item.description: 先说下自己目前很笼统的理解： 反向传播是用来快速计算梯度的一种方法； 过程大概是把计算过程用计算图表示，这样每一个中间步骤都有一个节点，每一个l

item.title: Difference Between Deep Learning Training and Inference
item.description: trainning的概念比较容易懂…最近天天在说inference…之前学习ML/DL 相关没有见过这个东西，有点
